channel.title: Login protocol
channel.description: i posted before in this section about wanting to learn how to write a server from scratch ,and i vain i told me to learn java io, stream buffers and login protocol. well i read up on java io ...come to find out i already new a great deal about it . i also read about stream buffers which is part of java io. anyways im not really sure about where to read about the login protocol so if som1 can point me in the rite direction that would be great
